markdownRemark.html:
FHIR API R4

Payer Data Exchange (PDex) API is built and supported using Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources (FHIR) version R4 (4.0.1).

API Specification

The Payer Data Exchange (PDex) API is fully described in an OpenAPI 3.0 compliant document. OpenAPI is a standard specification for describing APIs. OpenAPI descriptions allow both humans and machines to discover the capabilities of an API without needing to first read documentation or understand the implementation.

Current, active version is v4 (FHIR R4.0.1)

You may download the full specification here by clicking on this link to download Open API Specification or can interactively browse and execute within browser here at the Open API Sandbox .
